phrases: You found the candidate who could become the next queen?
She is close by, is she?
The Rising of the Shield Hero
We are getting out of here.
I cannot believe that rotten noble released that monster just to take out Naofumi!
We are screwed if it charges at us now.
Are you going to fight here?
We are in the center of town, you know!
We will lure it out of town first!
Maybe it is really coming after...
Then she can lure it out of town.
I will take these kids and run.
You are in the Shield Hero's party, are not you?
I will go meet up with my people.
I am sure we will meet again.
It really is coming after Filo-chan.
I am sorry I gave away that bracelet.
You are free to do whatever you want with it.
We are almost past the forest!
I am all set to fight.
It is slow, but we cannot even scratch it!
We do not have unlimited stamina.
I will have to use the Rage Shield.
It is a high-level magic field.
You mean we are trapped here?
Do not resort to that power.
Your body reacted badly to the Dragon Emperor's fragment and grew beyond control.
If you hand over that fragment now, I shall spare your life.
I will end this at once.
The Shield Hero, I take it?
I wish to discuss many things with you,
but I know this form is not suitable.
I am the queen of all filolials the world over,
Centuries ago, a hero of the time is said to have raised a filolial.
No, I have always been Fitoria.
Will I also be as big as her one day?
I could not feed you if you grew that big, so you would be on your own.
That would take dozens of times longer than a normal filolial's lifespan,
so do not worry yourself over it.
In other words, she is lived that long?
It is your turn to introduce yourselves, Shield Hero's party.
We have met before, have not we?
Thank you for your help that time.
It is a pleasure to meet you again.
I ran into her on the way back to the capital after a diplomatic visit.
So you have made a habit of that, huh?
Anyway, I am grateful that you took out that monster.
But what do you want with us?
It is a long story, and this is not a great place for a chat.
Let me take you somewhere more suitable.
I do not like a Cardinal Hero using dragon material in his equipment.
It serves as precious fodder to develop my shield.
And I already sense an ominous aura in your shield.
Curse powers are certainly immense, but so are their consequences.
Regardless, I need dragon material and the Rage Shield in order to survive.
I will order my family to bring it along.
I will need you to answer several questions when we get there.
You can practically feel their history.
I hear it is considered the remains of the civilization the original heroes defended.
You do not sound very sure.
It existed before I was born.
For what it is worth, I am watching over it.
I am not supposed to bring humans here.
Then I guess we will be safe here for the time being.
I think you should get some rest.
Let us take a break, then.
I wonder if Keel-kun and the other kids are all right.
They have got Van and those demi-humans with them.
I bet you are all hungry.
I feel too guilty to eat.
They even eat in the same sloppy manner.
Bring me some huge pots and a ton of ingredients!
Why did I even have to feed this KFC farm?
You are not getting any seconds.
I want to know how that monster was released from its seal.
I thought you came to save us because you knew.
I was there because I was told a new queen candidate had been found.
Why is Filo growing so differently than other filolials?
I am appalled at you Cardinal Heroes
for squabbling with the Wave nearly here.
I know the Shield Hero has always been scorned by human supremacist countries.
That is why we are trying to cross the border
That will not solve a thing.
As much as humans and demi-humans might hate each other,
it is unacceptable for heroes to be fighting.
Do not you Cardinal Heroes know about the hourglass?
Then why are not you fighting Waves across the world?
Are you saying the Waves happen outside of Melromarc, too?
The Four Cardinal Heroes are meant to be summoned to one country each
and help them fight the Waves.
First I have heard of that.
I am going wherever I am asked.
But you four are not taking part in any other battles.
Hell, I only found out recently that other countries had their own hourglasses.
Honestly, I do not care about what happens to humans.
I fight because the hero who raised me asked me to.
My job is to protect the world.
She wants to save the world when she does not care about humans?
But I cannot protect it all by myself.
But you seem far more capable than us.
I will not be able to save a thing.
And that is why you need the heroes?
Yeah, it definitely seems like the Three Heroes Church is hiding something.
I cannot believe Naofumi was right.
Keep your noses out of this!
You are telling me to make up with those guys?
Heroes are supposed to work together.
That is an absolute necessity in order to protect the world.
That country, along with those guys, is trying to get rid of me.
I have heard the gist of what is been happening.
But heroes must not fight among themselves.
You seem rather obsessed with that.
Because it is unacceptable, that is why.
They do not want to play nice.
It is a lost because now.
It was all so long ago that my memory of it has faded,
but I do still remember the right thing to do.
If the heroes are fighting each other
instead of the Waves of Catastrophe,
then for the sake of the world,
I must kill the Four Cardinal Heroes.
